Title: Reina santa
Director: Henrique Campos, Aníbal Contreiras, Rafael Gil
Writer: Tavares Alves, Aníbal Contreiras (story), Rafael Gil, Luna de Oliveira (Portuguese dialogue), Luna de Oliveira (screenplay), Luna de Oliveira (story), Antonio Tudela (Spanish dialogue)
Actors: Maruchi Fresno, Antonio Vilar, Luis Peña, Fernando Rey
Plot: A virtuous Spanish princess becomes Queen of Portugal, then troubled by social struggles and court intrigue. She negotiates a truce between the king's and his son's factions; and performs a...
